definition: string of pearl and jade (idiom); ideal combination/perfect pair
bead/pearl/CL:粒[li4],顆|颗[ke1]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
jade annulus
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
variant of 合[he2]

sentences.english: It is not every couple that is a pair.
sentences.chinese: 成双成对多，珠联璧合少。

sentences.english: John and his wife are well - matched.
sentences.chinese: 约翰和他妻子是珠联璧合。

sentences.english: All Portfolio wine is handmade with painstaking attentions to details.
sentences.chinese: 所有珠联璧合葡萄酒都是手工制作，精心细致。

sentences.english: The Chinese and Western architecture styles set each other off perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 中西建筑风格在这里真是珠联璧合。

sentences.english: And if Scola fits next to Yao Ming?
sentences.chinese: 而且，如果斯科拉和姚明珠联璧合呢？

definition: a match made in heaven (idiom)
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
in perfect harmony/in sync/lit. qin and se sing in harmony
lit. made by Heaven and arranged by Earth(idiom)/ideal/perfect/(of a match) made in heaven/to be made for one another
talented man and beautiful woman/ideal couple
two remarkable persons living at the same period (as 周瑜[Zhou1 Yu2] and 諸葛亮|诸葛亮[Zhu1 ge3 Liang4])
to complement one another (idiom)
fig. the man sings and the woman follows/fig. marital harmony
to match harmoniously
lit. seamless heavenly clothes (idiom)/fig. flawless
too wonderful for words
lit. golden boys and jade maidens (idiom)/attendants of the Daoist immortals/fig. lovely young children/a golden couple/(of a couple who are in the public eye) a lovely young couple
lit. a pair of birds flying close together (idiom)/fig. two hearts beating as one/name of a sweet and sour chicken wing dish
married couple very much in love/deep conjugal love
to fly wing to wing (idiom)/two hearts beating as one/(of a couple) inseparable
to set each other off nicely
